title: Estonian Encyclopaedia Publishers
text:
Estonian Encyclopaedia Publishers () was an <a href="Estonia">Estonia</a>n <a href="publisher">publisher</a> which published reference literature (like <a href="encyclopedia">encyclopedia</a>s, <a href="atlas">atlas</a>es) and <a href="popular%20science">popular science</a> literature.
As of 2009 publisher's main shareholders were <a href="Hardo%20Aasm%C3%A4e">Hardo Aasmäe</a> (owned 25.6%), (owned 20.4%), and <a href="%C3%9Clo%20Kaevats">Ülo Kaevats</a> (owned 12.0%).
In 2011 the publisher went bankrupt.
